name: Bewilderness
description:
Bewilderness is a contemplative, interactive sound walk through a forest at night for mobile VR and PC. The player moves through the area, relaxing and listening to the many sounds of the forest.

The player's vision is blurred, with only colours and silhouettes of familiar objects being seen, thus prompting a focus on the various sounds of the forest: Variations in ground composition are recognised through different footsteps, a lush flora and fauna emitting sounds above, below and all around the player - all the elements, fire, air, water and earth are recognised.

Please choose the Fantastic quality setting on startup. Headphones recommended.
